name: Beat in the Box
description:
Beat in the box is a game about dodging or collecting the notes of the music as they pass by. You can control gravity with WASD or the Arrow keys, but gravity is also effected by the black hole in the middle of the arena. Choose between two modes for the two available songs and try for a high score!

This game was made for the game jam; Mini jam 107.

all assets were made during the jam with the exception of two fonts;

Rubber Biscuit by dabnotu

 Lunchtime Doubly So by codeman38
